description: abstracted image with muted tones of brown, pink, and light blue; black linear shapes with crisscrossing lines and crescent-shaped elements overlaps washy pigments; light brown triangle shape in top center of image; black, spotty sections in all corners as well as left and right center edges
inscription: LLC, in margin, in pencil: Frosty Window | in bottom center, in pencil: proof | LRC, in pencil: 48 | on back in pencil, in LRC: HH 93389-1
provenance: Hildegarde Haas, Berkeley, Calif. (until d. 2002); by descent to son Peter Haas (until 2017; consigned to Old Print Shop); (Old Print Shop, New York, 2017-18; sold to Kinney); Marla J. Kinney, Minneapolis (2018-19)
signed: LRC, in margin, in pencil: Hildegarde Haas 1951
title: Frosty Window
